gist.headline: Fresh canvas detected
gist.blurb: A new creative tool has sprouted in the garden. Hzliflow joins the showcase, bringing more AI painting powers to the people.
gist.summary: Added 'hzliflow' to the Creative apps showcase, an online AI painting platform for image generation and editing.
gist.impact: Users can now discover and access this new AI art tool directly from our community apps list.
gist.visual_concept: An art-themed scene where the bee mascot welcomes a new tool. Since it's a painting platform, an easel or digital canvas fits perfectly.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot wearing a tiny painter's beret, holding a pixel brush near a glowing lime green (#ecf874) digital canvas. A retro easel stands in a sunlit garden. Soft pastel gradient background. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, chunky sprites.
